definition: to use anywhere, anytime (card, ticket etc)/to be used by everyone (language, textbook etc)/(of two or more things) interchangeable
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
common coding for components of Chinese character/same as Zheng coding 鄭碼|郑码[Zheng4 ma3]

pinyin: tong1 yong4 chuan4 xing2 zong3 xian4

definition: the common use romanization system introduced in Taiwan in 2003

pinyin: Tong1 yong4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1

definition: UCS, Chinese character coding adopted in PRC 1986/abbr. to 通用碼|通用码[tong1 yong4 ma3]
pinyin: tong1 yong4 Han4 zi4 biao1 zhun3 jiao1 huan4 ma3

definition: common coding/same as 通用漢字標準交換碼|通用汉字标准交换码[tong1 yong4 Han4 zi4 biao1 zhun3 jiao1 huan4 ma3]

sentences.english: The sky is blue and fields are green and laughter is the language of the world.
sentences.chinese: 蓝天碧草之间笑声成了世亖界通用的语言。

sentences.english: English, as a most popular language, its communicational function is more and more important.
sentences.chinese: 英语作为世界最通用的语言，其交际功能愈显重要。

sentences.english: Smiling at the Dornish knights, she switched back to the Common Tongue.
sentences.chinese: 边对多恩骑士微笑，她边转换成通用语。

sentences.english: Every general-purpose computer has its own unique instruction repertoire.
sentences.chinese: 每台通用计算机都有其独有的指令系统。

sentences.english: GM to shut US plants up to 9 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车美国工厂将放假9周。

sentences.english: The bailout will, in fact, solve several of G.M.’s biggest problems.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，这次的救助确实会解决通用的一些顽疾。

sentences.english: Hummer made GM seem like the gas-guzzler company.
sentences.chinese: 悍马让通用汽车看起来像是一家耗油大户。

sentences.english: Construct a universal relay model that the action boundary can be self-defined.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种通用的动作边界可自定义的继电器模型。

sentences.english: He initiated and managed technology collaborations with Chinese partners for GM.
sentences.chinese: 他为通用汽车发起并管理与中国合作伙伴的技术协作。

sentences.english: A general program of formulating of recipe suitable for self-drying water-soluble alkyd resin was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了适合于水溶性醇酸树脂配方设计的通用程序。

sentences.english: At General Motors this summer, I worked as a validation engineer.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天，我在通用汽车公司，担任验证工程师。

sentences.english: Finds all the global catalogs in this forest.
sentences.chinese: 在此树系中寻找所有通用类别目录。

sentences.english: Splicing row can be assembled on the spot.
sentences.chinese: 列架可采用通用件现场组装，外形美观。

sentences.english: GE said the charges are inaccurate.
sentences.chinese: 通用电气说，这些指控是错误的。

sentences.english: Evaluating your fitness level is not a one-size-fits-all process.
sentences.chinese: 评估你的健康水准并不存在一个通用的程式。

sentences.english: Test of Semiactive Landing Gear Control For a General Aviation Aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 一种通用航空飞机半主动起落架控制的试验。

definition: to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app

pinyin: Tong1 yong4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1
